known_issues: Draft and Live pages are taking too much time to load (performance issue reported).

existing_features.title: Reduce initial JavaScript bundle size by code-splitting route components so that non-home pages (learning, glossary, articles, research, blogs, calculators, admin, etc.) are loaded lazily only when the user navigates to them.
Add a consistent route-level loading UI (e.g., a minimal skeleton/spinner) for lazy-loaded routes so the app provides immediate feedback during chunk download and canister query latency.
Defer non-critical UI and network work on first paint by loading the ChatAssistantWidget asynchronously (do not block initial render on its code or initialization).
Optimize above-the-fold image loading on the home page by ensuring the hero image does not block first render and minimizes layout shift (use explicit dimensions and appropriate loading behavior).

Reduce redundant backend queries during app startup by tuning React Query settings for global/initial checks and always-on components (e.g., maintenance/admin checks and footer market ticker) to avoid aggressive refetching and to cache results appropriately.

new_feature_requests.summary: Optimize Draft and Live page load time/performance (e.g., images, code splitting, loading tweaks)

projectName: Optimize Draft and Live page load performance (code splitting, deferred widgets, query caching)
